mapper.select: SELECT b.*, user.name AS userName, trainer.name AS trainerName, t.name AS ticketName, t.price AS ticketPrice FROM buy_list b JOIN users user ON b.user_no = user.no LEFT JOIN users trainer ON b.trainer_no = trainer.no JOIN Ticket t ON b.ticket_no = t.no WHERE user.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') LIMIT #{page.index}, #{page.rows}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM buy_list b JOIN users user ON b.user_no = user.no LEFT JOIN users trainer ON b.trainer_no = trainer.no JOIN Ticket t ON b.ticket_no = t.no WHERE user.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
SELECT b.*, user.name AS userName, t.name AS ticketName, t.price AS ticketPrice FROM buy_list b JOIN users user ON b.user_no = user.no JOIN Ticket t ON b.ticket_no = t.no WHERE b.user_no = #{userNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE buy_list SET status = '환불', canceled_at = NOW() WHERE no = #{no}
UPDATE buy_list SET status = '만료' WHERE end_date < NOW()
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO buy_list (ticket_no, user_no, trainer_no, start_date, end_date) VALUES (#{ticketNo}, #{userNo}, #{trainerNo}, #{startDate}, #{endDate})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM buy_list WHERE user_no = #{userNo} ORDER BY buy_date DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT t.no AS ticketNo, t.name AS ticketName, t.price AS ticketPrice, u.name AS trainerName, IFNULL(COUNT(b.no), 0) AS salesCount FROM Ticket t LEFT JOIN buy_list b ON b.ticket_no = t.no LEFT JOIN users u ON b.trainer_no = u.no WHERE (#{trainerNo} IS NULL OR u.no = #{trainerNo}) AND (#{year} IS NULL OR YEAR(b.buy_date) = #{year}) AND (#{month} IS NULL OR MONTH(b.buy_date) = #{month}) AND (#{day} IS NULL OR DAY(b.buy_date) = #{day}) GROUP BY t.no, t.name, t.price, u.name ORDER BY t.no ASC
